name: Electric Flowers Still Bloom
description:
Humanity may be gone, but art lives forever. Two young graffiti poets strike out to do what none of their fellow artists have successfully done yet- place a poem in Jetsam Pier. 

However, Jetsam Pier is more than just a blank canvas, and there are reasons why the walls remain unclaimed. Will you make your mark?

This game is currently a demo, completed for My First Game Jam Winter 2022. The full game will be released soon!

Visual art done by @SugarBeetles. Music and Sound Design done by Devin Nelson, @devindecibel. Writing and Programming done by Pepper Parker, @pepperparkerwrites.
